way*o<MUN>'mEr ham*E<ZQP>lEk@ l@'aS@p*@na<TIP>z ra<MUN>b sA<SIL>riysA<ATN>yw l@hAbi<GAR>y' mib*@ne<DAR>y yiW@rA'e<TEB>l w*miz*E<MER>ra` ham*@lw*kA<TIP>h w*min=ha<SIL>p*ar@t*@mi<SIL>ym:

y@lAdi<MUN>ym '<HPA>SE<MUN>r 'e<SIL>yn=b*AhE<MUN>m k*Al=m'w*m<TLP> w@Tw^obe<AZL>y mar@'E<GER>h w*maW@k*ili<MUN>ym b*@kAl=xAk@mA<RBM>h w@yo<MEH>d@`ey da<AZL>`at<PAS> w*m@biyne<MUN>y mad*A<ZQP>` wa<SIL>'<HPA>SEr<PAS> k*o<MUN>xa b*AhE<ZQP>m la<SIL>`<HPA>mo<TIP>d b*@heyka<MUN>l ham*E<ATN>lEk@ w*<SIL>l@lam*@dA<MER>m se<TIP>pEr w*l@S<MER>w^on k*aW@d*i<SIL>ym:

way@man<TLP> lAhE<AZL>m ham*E<GER>lEk@ d*@bar=y<MUN>w^om b*@yw^om<RBM>w^o mip*at=b*a<MEH>g ham*E<AZL>lEk@<PAS> w*miy*e<MUN>yn miS@t*A<ZQP>yw w*<SIL>l@gad*@lA<TIP>m SAni<MUN>ym SAl<ATN>w^oS w*mi<AZL>q@YAtA<ZQP>m ya<SIL>`am@d<TIP>w* lip@ne<MER>y ham*E<SIL>lEk@:
way@hi<MER>y bAhE<TIP>m mib*@ne<MUN>y y@hw*dA<ATN>h d*A<SIL>niy*e<MUN>'l x<HPA>nan@yA<ZQP>h mi<SIL>ySA'e<TIP>l wa<SIL>`<HPA>zar@yA<SIL>h:

way*A<DAR>WEm lAhE<TEB>m Wa<MER>r has*A<SIL>riysi<TIP>ym Sem<ATN>w^ot way*A<AZL>WEm l@dA<SIL>niy*e<GER>'l b*e<MUN>l@T@Sa'Y*a<RBM>r w@la<SIL>x<HPA>nan@yAh<PAS> Sad@ra<ZQP>k@ w*l@mi<SIL>ySA'e<MUN>l meySa<ZQP>k@ w@la<SIL>`<HPA>zar@yA<TIP>h `<HPA>be<MER>d n@g<SIL>w^o:

way*A<MEH>WEm d*A<SIL>niy*e'l<PAS> `al=lib*<ZQP>w^o '<HPA>SE<DAR>r lo<SIL>'=yit@g*A'a<TEB>l b*@pat=b*a<MER>g ham*E<TIP>lEk@ w*b@ye<MUN>yn miS@t*A<ATN>yw way@baq*eS<PAS> miW/*ׂa<MUN>r has*A<SIL>riysi<ZQP>ym '<HPA>SE<TIP>r lo<MER>' yit@g*A'A<SIL>l:
way*it*e<MEH>n hA<SIL>'<HSE>lohiym<PAS> 'Et=d*A<MUN>niy*e<ZQP>'l l@xE<TIP>sEd w*<SIL>l@rax<HPA>mi<ATN>ym lip@ne<TIP>y Wa<MER>r has*A<SIL>riysi<SIL>ym:

way*o<GER>'mEr Wa<MEH>r has*A<SIL>riysiym<PAS> l@dA<MUN>niy*e<ZQP>'l yAre<MEH>' '<HPA>niy<PAS> 'Et='<HPA>doni<MUN>y ham*E<ZQP>lEk@ '<HPA>SE<MUN>r min*A<ZQP>h 'Et=ma<SIL>'<HPA>kal@kE<TIP>m w@'Et=miS@t*eykE<ATN>m '<HPA>SE<PAZ>r lAm*Ah<TLP> yir@'E<AZL>h 'Et=p*@neykE<GER>m zo<SIL>`<HPA>pi<RBM>ym min=hay@lAdiym<PAS> '<HPA>SE<MUN>r k*@gi<SIL>yl@kE<ZQP>m w@xiy*ab@t*E<MER>m 'Et=ro'Si<TIP>y lam*E<SIL>lEk@:

way*o<MER>'mEr d*A<SIL>niy*e<TIP>'l 'El=ham*El@Ya<ATN>r '<HPA>SE<MEH>r min*Ah<PAS> Wa<MUN>r has*A<SIL>riysi<ZQP>ym `al=d*A<SIL>niy*e<MUN>'l x<HPA>nan@yA<ZQP>h mi<SIL>ySA'e<TIP>l wa<SIL>`<HPA>zar@yA<SIL>h:
nas=nA<MER>' 'Et=`<HPA>bAdE<TIP>ykA yAmi<MUN>ym `<HPA>WArA<ATN>h w@yit*@nw*=lA<GER>nw* min=haz*e<SIL>ro`i<TEB>ym w@no<SIL>'k@lA<TIP>h w*ma<MER>yim w@niS@t*E<SIL>h:

w@ye<SIL>rA'<MEH>w* l@pAnE<AZL>ykA<PAS> mar@'e<ZQP>ynw* w*mar@'eh<PAS> hay@lAdi<ZQP>ym hA'o<MUN>k@li<ZQP>ym 'e<TIP>t p*at=b*a<MUN>g ham*E<ATN>lEk@ w@ka<SIL>'<HPA>SE<MUN>r t*ir@'e<ZQP>h `<HPA>We<TIP>h `im=`<HPA>bAdE<SIL>ykA:
way*iS@ma<MER>` lAhE<TIP>m lad*AbA<MUN>r haz*E<ATN>h way@nas*e<TIP>m yAmi<MER>ym `<HPA>WArA<SIL>h:

w*miq@YAt<PAS> yAmi<MUN>ym `<HPA>WArA<ZQP>h nir@'A<MEH>h mar@'eyhEm<PAS> T<ZQP>w^ob w*b@riy'e<TIP>y b*AWA<ATN>r mi<AZL>n=k*Al=hay@lAdi<ZQP>ym hA'o<MUN>k@li<ZQP>ym 'e<TIP>t p*at=b*a<MER>g ham*E<SIL>lEk@:
way@hi<MUN>y ham*El@Ya<RBM>r noWe'<PAS> 'Et=p*at=b*AgA<ZQP>m w@ye<TIP>yn miS@t*eyhE<ATN>m w@note<MER>n lAhE<TIP>m ze<SIL>r@`oni<SIL>ym:

w@hay@lAdi<MEH>ym hA'e<AZL>l*Eh<PAS> 'ar@b*a`@t*A<ZQP>m nAta<AZL>n lAhE<DAR>m hA<SIL>'<HSE>lohi<TEB>ym mad*A<MER>` w@haW@k*e<TIP>l b*@kAl=se<MUN>pEr w@xAk@mA<ATN>h w@dA<SIL>niy*e<MUN>'l hebi<ZQP>yn b*@kAl=xAz<TIP>w^on wa<SIL>x<HPA>lom<SIL>w^ot:
w*l@miq@YAt<PAS> hay*Ami<ZQP>ym '<HPA>SEr='Ama<MER>r ham*E<TIP>lEk@ la<SIL>h<HPA>biy'A<ATN>m way@biy'em<PAS> Wa<MUN>r has*A<SIL>riysi<ZQP>ym lip@ne<TIP>y n@bu<SIL>kad@nEY*a<SIL>r:

way@dab*e<MUN>r 'it*Am<ZIN> ham*ElEk@<AST> w@lo<MEH>' nim@YA'<PAS> mik*ul*A<ZQP>m k*@dA<SIL>niy*e<MUN>'l x<HPA>nan@yA<ZQP>h mi<SIL>ySA'e<TIP>l wa<SIL>`<HPA>zar@yA<ATN>h way*a<SIL>`am@d<TIP>w* lip@ne<MER>y ham*E<SIL>lEk@:

w@ko<RBM>l d*@bar<PAS> xAk@ma<MUN>t b*iynA<ZQP>h '<HPA>SEr=b*iq*e<MER>S mehE<TIP>m ham*E<ATN>lEk@ wa<SIL>y*im@YA'e<GAR>m `E<MUN>WEr yAd<RBM>w^ot `a<MEH>l k*Al=ha<SIL>xar@Tum*iym<PAS> hA<SIL>'aW/*.Api<ZQP>ym '<HPA>SE<TIP>r b*@kAl=mal@kw*t<SIL>w^o:
wa<SIL>y@hiy<PAS> d*A<SIL>niy*e<ZQP>'l `ad=S@na<MER>t 'axa<TIP>t l@k<MER>w^orES ham*E<SIL>lEk@:

w*biS@na<MUN>t S@t*a<RBM>yim l@mal@kw*t<PAS> n@bu<SIL>kad@nEY*a<ZQP>r xAla<MER>m n@bu<SIL>kad@nEY*a<TIP>r x<HPA>lom<ATN>w^ot wat*it@p*A<MUN>`Em rw*x<ZQP>w^o w*S@nAt<TIP>w^o ni<SIL>h@y@tA<MER>h `AlA<SIL>yw:

way*o<MUN>'mEr ha<TLM>m*ElEk@ liq@ro<AZL>' la<SIL>xar@Tum*i<GER>ym w@lA<SIL>'aW/*.Api<RBM>ym w@la<SIL>m@kaW/*.@piym<PAS> w@lak*aW@d*i<ZQP>ym l@hag*i<MER>yd lam*E<TIP>lEk@ x<HPA>lo<SIL>motA<ATN>yw way*Abo<ZQM>'w* way*a<SIL>`am@d<TIP>w* lip@ne<MER>y ham*E<SIL>lEk@:
way*o<DAR>'mEr lAhE<TEB>m ham*E<TIP>lEk@ x<HPA>l<MUN>w^om xAlA<ATN>m@t*iy wat*ip*A<MUN>`Em rw*xi<ZQP>y lAda<TIP>`at 'E<SIL>t=hax<HPA>l<SIL>w^om:

wa<SIL>y@dab*@r<DAR>w* hak*aW@d*i<TEB>ym lam*E<TIP>lEk@ '<HPA>rAmi<ATN>yt mal@k*A'<PAS> l@`A<SIL>l@mi<MUN>yn x<HSE>yi<ZQP>y '<HSE>ma<MER>r xEl@mA<TEB>' l`bdyk (l@`ab@dA<TIP>k@) w*piS@rA<MER>' n@xaw*e<SIL>':

`Ane<MEH>h mal@k*A'<PAS> w@'Ama<MUN>r lkW/dy' (l@kaW@d*A'e<ZQP>y) mil*@tA<TIP>h min*i<MUN>y 'az@d*A<ATN>' he<MUN>n lA<MEH>' t@h<SIL>w^od@`w*n*a<AZL>niy<PAS> xEl@mA<MUN>' w*piS@re<ZQP>h* had*Amiyn<PAS> t*it@`ab@d<ZQP>w*n w*bA<SIL>t*eyk<TIP>w^on n@wAli<MER>y yit*@WAm<SIL>w*n:

w@he<AZL>n xEl@mA<MEH>' w*piS@reh*<PAS> t*@<SIL>hax<HPA>w<ZQP>͏on mat*@nA<MEH>n w*n@biz@b*Ah<PAS> wiyqA<MUN>r Wag*i<ZQP>y' t*@qab*@l<TIP>w*n min=q<HQA>dAmA<ATN>y lAhe<ZQM>n xEl@mA<MER>' w*piS@re<TIP>h* ha<SIL>x<HPA>w<SIL>͏oniy:
`<HPA>n<MER>w^o tin@yAn<TIP>w*t w@'A<SIL>m@ri<ATN>yn mal@k*A<ZQM>' xEl@mA<TEB>' ye'ma<MER>r l@`ab@d<TIP>w^ohiy w*piS@rA<MER>h n@ha<SIL>x<HPA>we<SIL>h:

`Ane<MEH>h mal@k*A'<PAS> w@'Ama<ZQP>r min=yaY*iyb<PAS> yAda<MUN>` '<HPA>nA<ZQP>h d*i<MER>y `id*AnA<TIP>' 'an@t*<MUN>w*n zA<SIL>b@ni<ATN>yn k*Al=q<HQA>bel<PAS> d*i<MUN>y x<HPA>zeyt<ZQP>w^on d*i<MER>y 'az@d*A<TIP>' min*i<MER>y mil*@tA<SIL>':

d*i<MUN>y hen=xEl@mA'<TLP> lA<AZL>' t@h<SIL>w^od@`un*a<GER>niy x<HPA>dAh=hi<MUN>y' dA<SIL>t@k<RBM>w^on w*mil*A<AZL>h kid@bA<MEH>h w*S@xiytAh<PAS> hzmntwn (hiz@d*@min@t*w*n<PAS>) l@me'ma<MUN>r qA<SIL>dAma<ZQP>y `a<TEB>d d*i<MER>y `id*AnA<TIP>' yiS@t*an*e<ATN>' lAhe<RBM>n xEl@mA'<PAS> '<HSE>ma<MUN>rw* li<ZQP>y w@<SIL>'in@d*a<ZQM>` d*i<MER>y piS@re<TIP>h* t*@ha<SIL>x<HPA>wun*a<SIL>niy:

`<HPA>n<AZL>w^o kW/dy' (kaW@d*A'e<MEH>y) q<HQA>dAm=mal@k*A'<PAS> w@'A<MUN>m@ri<ZQP>yn lA<SIL>'='iyta<MEH>y '<HSE>nAS<PAS> `al=yab*ES@t*A<ZQP>' d*i<YET>y mil*a<MUN>t mal@k*A<ZQP>' yw*ka<TIP>l l@ha<SIL>x<HPA>wAyA<ATN>h k*Al=q<HQA>be<RBM>l d*i<YET>y k*Al=mE<AZL>lEk@<PAS> ra<MUN>b w@Sal*i<ZQP>yT mil*A<MEH>h kid@nAh<PAS> lA<MUN>' S@'e<ZQP>l l@kAl=xar@To<TIP>m w@'ASa<MER>p w@kaW@d*A<SIL>y:

w*mil*@tA<AZL>' di<SIL>y=mal@k*A<MEH>h SA'el<PAS> yaq*iyrA<ZQP>h w@'A<SIL>x<HQA>rAn<PAS> lA<MUN>' 'iyta<ZQP>y d*i<MER>y y@xaw*in*a<TIP>h* q<HQA>dA<MUN>m mal@k*A<ATN>' lAhe<MUN>n '<HSE>lAhi<ZQP>yn d*i<YET>y m@dA<MUN>r@h<ZQP>w^on `im=b*iW@rA<TIP>' lA<MER>' 'iyt<SIL>w^ohiy:
k*Al=q<HQA>be<MUN>l d*@nA<ZQP>h mal@k*A<ZQM>' b*@na<TIP>s w*q@Ya<MUN>p Wag*i<ATN>y' wa<SIL>'<HPA>mar<PAS> l@h<MUN>w^obAdA<ZQP>h l@ko<TIP>l xak*iyme<MER>y bAbE<SIL>l:
w@dAtA<MUN>' nEp@qa<ZQP>t w@xak*i<SIL>ymay*A<TIP>' mi<SIL>t@qaT*@li<ATN>yn w*b@`<TEB>w^o d*A<SIL>niy*e<MER>'l w@xab@r<TIP>w^ohiy l@hit@q@TAlA<SIL>h:

b*e'da<MUN>yin d*A<SIL>niy*e<RBM>'l h<HPA>tiyb<PAS> `eTA<MUN>' w*T@`e<ZQP>m l@'ar@y<ZQM>w^ok@ rab=Tab*A<SIL>xay*A<TIP>' d*i<MUN>y mal@k*A<ATN>' d*i<YET>y n@pa<MUN>q l@qaT*AlA<ZQP>h l@xak*iyme<TIP>y b*AbE<SIL>l:

`Ane<MUN>h w@'Ama<RBM>r l@'ar@yw^ok@<PAS> Sal*iyTA<MUN>' di<SIL>y=mal@k*A<ZQP>' `al=mA<MER>h dAtA<TEB>' m@hax@Y@pA<TIP>h min=q<HQA>dA<MUN>m mal@k*A<ATN>' '<HSE>da<MUN>yin mil*@tA<ZQP>' hw^oda<MER>` 'ar@y<TIP>w^ok@ l@dA<SIL>niy*e<SIL>'l:
w@dA<MUN>niy*e<ZQP>'l `a<TIP>l w*b@`A<MUN>h min=mal@k*A<ATN>' d*i<YET>y z@mA<MUN>n yin@t*in=le<ZQP>h* w*piS@rA<TIP>' l@ha<SIL>x<HPA>wAyA<MER>h l@mal@k*A<SIL>':
'<HSE>da<MER>yin d*A<SIL>niy*e<TIP>'l l@bay@te<MUN>h* '<HPA>za<ATN>l w@<TLM>la<SIL>x<HPA>nan@yAh mi<SIL>ySA'e<DAR>l wa<SIL>`<HPA>zar@yA<TEB>h xab@r<TIP>w^ohiy mil*@tA<MER>' hw^oda<SIL>`:

w@ra<SIL>x<HPA>mi<RBM>yn l@mib@`e'<PAS> min=q<HQA>dAm<PAS> '<HSE>lA<MUN>h* S@may*A<ZQP>' `al=rAzA<TIP>' d*@nA<ATN>h d*i<MUN>y lA<MEH>' y@h<SIL>w^ob@dw*n<PAS> d*A<SIL>niy*e<MUN>'l w@xab@r<ZQP>w^ohiy `im=S@'A<TIP>r xak*iyme<MER>y bAbE<SIL>l:
'<HSE>da<RBM>yin l@dA<SIL>niy*e<TEB>'l b*@xEz@wA<MER>' di<SIL>y=leyl@yA<TIP>' rAzA<MUN>' g@li<ATN>y '<HSE>da<AZL>yin<PAS> d*A<SIL>niy*e<ZQP>'l b*Ari<TIP>k@ lE<SIL>'<HSE>lA<MER>h* S@may*A<SIL>':

`Ane<MEH>h dA<SIL>niy*e'l<PAS> w@'Ama<ZQP>r lE<SIL>h<HSE>we<AZL>' S@me<MEH>h* d*i<SIL>y='<HSE>lAhA'<PAS> m@bAra<ZQP>k@ min=`A<SIL>l@mA<TIP>' w@`a<MUN>d `A<SIL>l@mA<ATN>' d*i<DAR>y xAk@m@tA<TEB>' w*g@b<SIL>w*r@tA<TIP>' d*i<MER>y le<SIL>h*=hi<SIL>y':

w@<TLM>hw*' m@haS@ne<MEH>' `id*A<SIL>nay*A'<PAS> w@zim@nay*A<ZQP>' m@ha`@d*e<MER>h mal@ki<TIP>yn w*m@hAqe<MUN>ym mal@ki<ATN>yn yAhe<MEH>b xAk@m@tA'<PAS> l@xak*iymi<ZQP>yn w*man@d*@`A<TIP>' l@yA<SIL>d@`e<MER>y biynA<SIL>h:
h<TEB>w*' g*Ale<MER>' `am*i<SIL>yqAtA<TIP>' w*m@sat*@rAtA<ATN>' yAda`<PAS> mA<MUN>h ba<SIL>x<HPA>Sw^okA<ZQP>' wnhyr' (w*n@hw^orA<TIP>') `im*e<MER>h* S@re<SIL>':

lA<MUN>k@ | '<HSE>lA<MUN>h* '<HPA>bA<SIL>hAti<RBM>y m@hw^ode<MEH>' w*m@Sab*ax<PAS> '<HPA>nA<ZQP>h d*i<DAR>y xAk@m@tA<TEB>' w*g@b<SIL>w*r@tA<TIP>' y@ha<MUN>b@t*@ li<ATN>y w*k@`a<MEH>n h<SIL>w^oda`@t*a<AZL>niy<PAS> d*i<SIL>y=b@`e<MUN>ynA' min*A<ZQP>k@ d*i<SIL>y=mil*a<MER>t mal@k*A<TIP>' h<SIL>w^oda`@t*E<SIL>nA':

k*Al=q<HQA>be<MUN>l d*@nA<RBM>h d*A<SIL>niy*e'l<PAS> `a<MUN>l `al='ar@y<ZQP>w^ok@ d*i<YET>y man*i<MUN>y mal@k*A<ZQP>' l@h<SIL>w^obAdA<TIP>h l@xak*iyme<MUN>y bAbE<ATN>l '<HPA>za<MUN>l | w@ke<MUN>n '<HPA>mar=le<RBM>h* l@xak*iyme<MEH>y bAbEl<PAS> 'al=t*@hw^obe<ZQP>d ha`e<AZL>l@niy<PAS> q<HQA>dA<MUN>m mal@k*A<ZQP>' w*piS@rA<TIP>' l@mal@k*A<MER>' '<HPA>xaw*e<SIL>':

'<HSE>da<MEH>yin 'ar@yw^ok@<PAS> b*@hit@b*@hAlA<ZQP>h han@`e<MER>l l@dA<SIL>niy*e<TIP>'l q<HQA>dA<MUN>m mal@k*A<ATN>' w@ke<MUN>n '<HPA>mar=le<RBM>h* d*i<SIL>y=haS@k*a<MEH>xat g*@bar<PAS> min=b*@ne<MEH>y gA<SIL>lw*tA'<PAS> d*i<MUN>y y@h<ZQP>w*d d*i<MER>y piS@rA<TIP>' l@mal@k*A<MER>' y@hw^oda<SIL>`:

'<HSE><TLM>dayin g*ub@ray*A<MEH>' 'il*ek@<PAS> 'A<SIL>m@ri<ZQP>yn d*i<MUN>y lA<DAR>' n@haS@k*a<TEB>x l@dA<SIL>niy*e<MER>'l d*@nA<TIP>h k*Al=`il*A<ATN>h lAhe<ZQM>n haS@k*a<MER>x@nA<SIL>' `<HPA>l<TIP>w^ohiy b*@dA<MER>t '<HSE>lAhe<SIL>h*:
